April 18, 2017 Knowledge is the Ultimate Power.
Get some here.
No need to search the entire internet. Check out this month's most useful Knowledge Base <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115005752228#topten]]> articles. Let us share our knowledge with you.
- FAQ on Pivotal Cloud Foundry Elastic Runtime 1.10 Upgrade Advisory <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115005590468]]> - How to Backup Partitioned Tables - Greenplum Database <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115003280648]]> - Configuring File Descriptors on Linux for GemFire Servers <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115000345807]]> - How to Identify the Bucket Number of an External Table - Pivotal HDB <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115003658188]]>
A Tale of Tiles
Have you seen our new tile for caching? Pivotal Cloud Cache (PCC) is our first version of 'caching as a managed service' on Pivotal Cloud Foundry. It is designed to simplify configurations and the tools you use.
Read more <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115005752228#pcc]]> about the new possibilities this tile offers.
Product Updates
Explore, download, and update Pivotal software and services at Pivotal Network <[[https://network.pivotal.io/]]>. Check out our quick view of recent software updates and upcoming End of General Support dates here <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115005752228#updates]]>.

Pivotal Training
Interested in attending a hands-on, instructor-led class from Pivotal Training? Public classes are now scheduled and feature some of our newest offerings, including Pivotal Cloud Foundry Administrator, Spring Cloud Services, and Spring Boot Developer.
Best of all, many of our public classes are taught in a virtual environment - providing real-time instruction while eliminating the time and expense associated with travel.
